title: Chilli beef kebabs
ingredients: ['400g beef fillet or sirloin steaks, cut into 2.5cm cubes', 'salt and ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 lime, juiced', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 large garlic cloves, crushed', '1 large onion, sliced', '8 small flour tortilla wraps', 'For serving', '1 large tomato, chopped', '1/4 romaine lettuce, chopped', '4 tablespoons soured cream']
